name: Blind Line - Blackboard Chalk Puzzle Game
name_original: Blind Line - Blackboard Chalk Puzzle Game
description:
How good is your visual memory?

Can you remember the right path to the target?

Find out in BLIND LINE!

Try to solve impossible challenges using a piece of chalk on a blackboard! Use your finger to draw on the board to get stars and reach the final target! Seems easy right? Well try doing that with a board full with invisible obstacles - they only stay visible for a few seconds!

Use your brain and memorize the position of each obstacle. Too hard? Active the boosters Light, to illuminate all nearby area, and Reveal, showing the entire level again! Too Easy? Try our EXTREME mode, for an even more impossible challenge!

Get ready for an amazing brain challenge you will won't stop playing on BLIND LINE!

Game Features
• 100 incredible levels!
• Easy to play
• Incredible art
• Amazing music
• Highly addictive gameplay
• Share your gameplay videos over Facebook!
• Share your scores over Facebook
• Free updates with more levels!

Have fun!
